title: Ep283 Floral Fatalities
description:
This week, the gals make arrangements to discuss some brutal slayings. Topics include an unwelcome delivery, a very dangerous perennial, and why our brains love flowers so much. Get yourself a bottle of Winc's Rosa Obscura 2020 White Blend, keep an eye on your curry, and tune in for Floral Fatalities.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
